title: Grandia.II.Anniversary.Edition.v1.03-GOG
description:
Grandia II Anniversary Edition (c) GungHo Online

Release Date : 09/2015
Protection : -
Discs : 1
Genre : RPG
Game Version : 1.03
Languages : EN/JP

15 years after the stunning Dreamcast debut of Ryudo and his epic
adventure, Grandia II is back and better than ever! The classic
Japanese RPG returns with enhanced visuals, new difficulty level,
and features both keyboard and gamepad support! Take the role of a
hardened mercenary with a heart, and go on an epic adventure filled
with magic, new friendships, and surprising storyline twists in
search of a weapon once wielded by a deity.

For more info go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/330390/

1. Install the game
2. Install patch 1.02 and 1.03
2. Play!
